about_the_game:
This is a very free decompression game, you will be in a spacious and beautiful setting, enjoy pure exploration and relaxation.

There is only one scene in the game, but it has beautiful graphics and details that make you feel like you are there. You can explore every corner of the scene to discover hidden highlights and surprises.

There is no time limit, and you can spend as much time as you want playing and relaxing in the scene. At the same time, there are no missions or goals, and you are completely free to decide your own actions and thoughts.

The game also provides a variety of interactive elements, such as interacting with objects in the scene, simple exploration, and so on. These interactive elements allow you to delve deeper into the scene and discover more surprises.

If you like the freedom to explore and relax, then this game is sure to give you an enjoyable experience.

short_description: It's a shooter game designed to destroy buildings and it's very stressful when the buildings are broken to pieces The game such as name, aimless, find a place to calm down, see yourself, fumble the road, exploration of follow up, as long as keep moving forward, always arrive!!!
